creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: many turtles swimming down stream towards small rapids; many other turtles downstream swim up towards rapids; even more turtles climbing over rocks and over each other at rapids at center
signed: URC: [Nagatoshi]; URC before signature: [Ansei ko-shin shokabi  Nagatoshi] (1860 A summer day  Nagatoshi)
title: One Hundred Turtles
